page.title: 15Heath House (cont.)
page.content: The dining room table is quite unique as it opens out in segments from a central pivot.The walls of the drawing room are still covered by the original wall paper.Situated in the Italian Gardens is an orangery.The estate extends to approximately 500 acres used almost entirely as pasture land.Mrs Philips is one of the leading dignitaries of the Tean area.She came to the area on her marriage to her third cousin,Mr Philips,and has since lived in Heath House.Serving on many Committees,Mrs Philips was until recently a Cheadle Magistrate.She is a J.P.and also Chairman of Governors at Greatwood School,Tean.When requested, Mrs Philips opens the house to various societies.She is a regular customer in Tean shops,enjoying the friendliness of the people.Mrs Philips's son and daughter both live out of the area.
